segment.source: Technical Reference for MED-V
segment.target: Technical Reference for MED-V

segment.source: Technical Reference for MED-V
segment.target: Technical Reference for MED-V

segment.source: The technical reference information we provide here includes example checklists for planning, deployment, and operations for Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0.
segment.target: The technical reference information we provide here includes example checklists for planning, deployment, and operations for Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: Command-Line Options for MED-V Installation Files
segment.target: Command-Line Options for MED-V Installation Files

segment.source: Provides a list and description of the options that you can specify when you install or uninstall MED-V at the command prompt.
segment.target: Provides a list and description of the options that you can specify when you install or uninstall MED-V at the command prompt.

segment.source: Compacting the MED-V Virtual Hard Disk
segment.target: Compacting the MED-V Virtual Hard Disk

segment.source: Describes the steps to follow to compact your virtual hard disk before you configure your Windows XP image for use with MED-V.
segment.target: Describes the steps to follow to compact your virtual hard disk before you configure your Windows XP image for use with MED-V.

segment.source: MED-V Event Log Messages
segment.target: MED-V Event Log Messages

segment.source: Describes how to use the event logs in MED-V to troubleshoot deployment and operations issues.
segment.target: Describes how to use the event logs in MED-V to troubleshoot deployment and operations issues.

segment.source: Updating MED-V 2.0
segment.target: Updating MED-V 2.0

segment.source: Provides information about how to upgrade your MED-V installation.
segment.target: Provides information about how to upgrade your MED-V installation.

segment.source: Windows Virtual PC Application Exclude List
segment.target: Windows Virtual PC Application Exclude List

segment.source: Describes how to specify certain installed applications that you do not want published to the host computer.
segment.target: Describes how to specify certain installed applications that you do not want published to the host computer.

segment.source: MED-V 2 Configuration Cmdlets
segment.target: MED-V 2 Configuration Cmdlets

segment.source: Provides information about cmdlets you can use to perform various MED-V configuration tasks from the command line.
segment.target: Provides information about cmdlets you can use to perform various MED-V configuration tasks from the command line.

segment.source: MED-V 2 Workspace Cmdlets
segment.target: MED-V 2 Workspace Cmdlets

segment.source: Provides information about cmdlets you can use to perform various MED-V workspace configuration tasks from the command line.
segment.target: Provides information about cmdlets you can use to perform various MED-V workspace configuration tasks from the command line.

segment.source: Example MED-V Checklists
segment.target: Example MED-V Checklists

segment.source: Provides several checklist examples that you can reference when planning, deploying, or managing MED-V.
segment.target: Provides several checklist examples that you can reference when planning, deploying, or managing MED-V.
